txt.en: Perfect Flint Rune-stone of the Galadhrim Scroll Case[E]
On opening, the scroll case will reveal the Perfect Flint Rune-stone of the Galadhrim recipe.\n\nYou must be friendly with the Galadhrim and Artisan of the Jeweller's Guild to use this item.
Perfect Flint Rune-stone of the Galadhrim Scroll Cases[ps]
